availability_note: Available to connect. You can book a time via the Calendly link: https://calendly.com/jadamalmahendra/30min or reach out via email: jadamalmahendra@gmail.com.

potential_interview_questions: Can you elaborate on the Microfrontend architecture you implemented at Elliot Systems and the challenges you faced?
Tell me about the NFT marketplace you built at ViralNation. What were the key technical decisions, especially regarding Solidity and Web3.js integration?
How did you approach leading a distributed team at ViralNation, particularly ensuring effective communication and collaboration?
Describe a complex technical problem you solved while working on the real-time chat system using GraphQL Subscriptions.
Your resume mentions improving API response times by 30%+. Can you walk me through the optimizations you made?
How have you used AI, specifically the OpenAI API, in your projects beyond the smart assistant features mentioned?
As a Lead Developer at Oodles, how did you mentor junior developers and measure the impact on team efficiency?
How do you balance hands-on coding with leadership responsibilities?
What's your experience with ensuring code quality, testing (like the 95% coverage mentioned), and maintaining high standards in a fast-paced environment?
Where do you see Web3 technology heading, and how do you plan to continue developing your skills in that area?
Describe your process for collaborating with UI/UX designers to achieve pixel-perfect interfaces.
What aspects of being a Lead Software Developer do you find most rewarding and most challenging?
How do you stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in frontend and Web3 development?
Can you give an example of a time you had to make a difficult technical decision with trade-offs?
